list.abs: 【食品词典】V2_专业词汇_专业英语_食品伙伴网 ... vinegary 醋（似）的；有酸味的 vinegary fiavour 醋味 viner 豌豆剥壳机.
a vinegary smell is caused by acetic acid , while a nail polish aroma reflects the formation of ethyl acetate .像醋气味是由乙酸造成的，而指甲油味是由乙酸乙酯形成的。
large whipscorpion of Mexico and southern United States that emits a vinegary odor when alarmed .产于美国南部和墨西哥的大型鞭尾蝎，在受惊吓时发出一种醋酸味。
My neighbor is a vinegary person . I don ' t like her ., 我的邻居是个刻薄的人 , 我不喜欢她.
large whipscorpion of Mexico and southern United States that emits a vinegary odor when alarmed .产于美国南部和墨西哥的大型鞭尾蝎，在受惊吓时发出一种醋酸味。

means.word_mean: 1. a sourness resembling that of vinegar
